column4: Can anyone tell me why this is in the software Centre? https://apps.ubuntu.com/cat/applications/hdd-ranger/

Because people who incorrectly think that they need to defrag will pay $8.00 for a utility that will do so, despite the fact that ext4 rarely gets signifigant fragmentation and there are Free tools for defragging it in the rare cases that it does (like if you keep your filesystem at 95% full and add and delete many large and small files).
So, in other words, there is no quality control in the Software Centre.
Given those Free tools don't have a nice GUI (and I would guess that HDD Ranger is just a front end for them).
